translation:
Most Illustrious Sir  
Piratini, December 12, 1838.

By the Treasury Court, as has been determined today by this Department, orders will be issued for the Collector of Bagé to accept all seizures by Your Lordship's Treasury of Music, and all amounts not yet auctioned and included within the provisions of the Decrees of November 11, 1836 and April 1837: which I communicate for your understanding and in response to your letter of the 3rd of the current month.

God keep Your Lordship  
Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, December 12, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
Domingos José de Almeida
